html:
1.26.18  2:43 am   do you ever listen to a playlist of your own music while making videos or other music

     it would be difficult to listen to music while making other music. that would be like if a wine taster was chewing gum whilst trying to taste the wine

1.26.18  2:04 am   Heya! So I always sign up for thibgs I wanna do but then they become a task and I don't wanna do them anymore. Any advice?

     quit?

1.26.18  1:54 am   Do you like doing things?

     oh hell yeah

1.26.18  1:43 am   What is your opinion on quiet?

     i'll let you know when i hear it

1.26.18  1:23 am   6.4.16  12:01 pm expert page lists only 6 things between hoj and hotewig (not counting the 200 some odd reality vids). what happened to the other 5?

     they never got made, because i started making history of the entire world instead

1.26.18  1:11 am   how do you pronounce meme ?

     that depends on your tax bracket

1.26.18  1:07 am   what do you like

      the possibilities, of all the different things to like

1.26.18  1:06 am   your bio on the "bio" page is a really general bio, which is also my bio, and the bio of many other people. you know that if you posted a more detailed bio that was specific to yourself, the volume of ueqstions would get more manageable?

     why would that be the case

      you should seriously consider it

     i think a longer bio would bore people, and they would be forced to go to the questions page to send me spongebob quotes even sooner than they would have otherwise

1.26.18  12:48 am   frogs or goats?

     i know they both exist, but i can't be totally sure

1.26.18  12:35 am   hey bill, I hope everything is well. i know you work extensively on the history of____ videos,

     not anymore

      when do you believe the next one will be released? 

     how about something a little different

1.26.18  12:30 am   Why do you write songs

     to try to make people feel the way i do

1.26.18  12:30 am   Why do you write songs that are silly?

     to keep it interesting

1.26.18  12:14 am   who/what was your major inspiration for becoming a musician/songwriter?

     i don't remember

1.26.18  12:00 am   If something true is called "right", then why if something false isn't called "left"?

     ah, i see your point. i will change it

1.25.18  11:53 pm   what's the most fanciest alphabet?

     one of the chinese ones

1.25.18  11:48 pm   will the new video feature legumes, beans, and/or raisins?

     it seems like it does, but now that i think about it, it does not

1.25.18  11:29 pm   How many pairs of headphones do you own

     i don't know

     and why is that number more than one 

     when making recordings, it's important to check the final product through as many different sound sources as you can, to make that it sounds good on all of them

1.25.18  11:26 pm   Bill you have a brand to keep... type in lowercase PLEASE

     i have always used both capital and lowercase letters, as needed

1.25.18  11:25 pm   What does it feel like to see this many people wanting your opinion on various topics?

     my question is, what is it like to not have that

1.25.18  11:07 pm   i feel like i am unmotivated to finish big projects. i have been doing small projects for years and i know that i am capable of handling large ones, but whenever i hit a small inconvenience, i lose my creative spark. How would i change this?

     try a project that is small but just a bit larger than the ones you normally do

1.25.18  10:56 pm   Is there a message you're trying to send with your music?

     sure, and more

1.25.18  10:41 pm   what is your favourite flavour of air?

     fresh breeze

1.25.18  10:40 pm   does a god exist

     think bigger

1.25.18  10:18 pm   Billy, why is it that every time i drive my car i get nervous

     because it's very dangerous

1.25.18  9:56 pm   What if everything is upside down

     which side is down

1.25.18  9:52 pm   What if everything was something else? 

     i think it is

1.25.18  9:46 pm   can i email you a cactus, there are to many where i live

     if you email a cactus you will still have the original

1.25.18  9:41 pm   What is the nicest thing someone did for you

     gave birth to me

1.25.18  9:40 pm   What is the weirdest instrument you have used.

     the breakfast table

1.25.18  9:39 pm   What is something you are addicted to

     jokes, and science

1.25.18  9:22 pm   i composed a song about a cool spider today

     it sounds like you're on the right track

1.25.18  9:15 pm   where the fuck do bugs go during winter?

     they probably die and then next year it's new bugs

1.25.18  9:11 pm   go to hell

     i will go there when i get a chance

1.25.18  8:57 pm   Are you gonna put I'm crazy / It's raining on iTunes?

     yes. someone let me know if Tuesday is there yet, and then i will send the next one

1.25.18  8:08 pm   What is your general opinion on humans?

      9.27.17  5:29 pm

1.25.18  7:31 pm   when i open your page on mobile (android, google chrome) scrolling and typing are frustratingly difficult--as in, my framerate gets very choppy and text appears in the text box long after i type it. this problem has been happening since about when you released la de da and does not appear on computer. ahhh

     try it now, i just archived the first 20 days of jan

1.25.18  7:21 pm   What are random things I can to to change my life?

     sign up for some more spam

1.25.18  7:17 pm   what do you think about autocorrect?

     i thing ufc hefty resting if but firm rugged hit tug hawk

1.25.18  7:00 pm   what are your songs are about?

     you'll have to listen and see

1.25.18  6:47 pm   is there a way to sit?

     i think so

1.25.18  6:44 pm   how do i ask a succulent question?

     try sucking on it first, to test it, before you send it

1.25.18  6:41 pm   What are some ways I can motivate myself to do things that will be fufilling?

     if you think the results will be fulfilling then congratulations you are already motivated

1.25.18  6:37 pm   Ever thought of moving from a platform other than YouTube?

     i have always used many different platforms, the main one being billwurtz dot com.

      Why YouTube?

     youtube is worth including because it's very popular

1.25.18  5:33 pm   Do you think if we made a normal thing illegal (e.g. apples) people would suddenly want it more?

     you'll have to try it and see

1.25.18  5:10 pm   how do you come up with your videos

     i use my imagination

1.25.18  5:02 pm   what is the meaning of existence?

     meanability

1.25.18  4:56 pm   You know that crazy leaning dance mj does in smooth criminal? Is that real, or do you think there's some trickery going on with wires or special shoes or something? 

     their shoes hook into the stage

1.25.18  4:37 pm   Is there someone who have read this whole page of answered questions besides you?

     i don't think so

1.25.18  3:46 pm   i am vaguely afraid of iceberg lettuce but im scared of being rejected by my peers for the lettuce distress, is this normal?

     yes, but you could see a therapist anyway, in case your friends reject you you can be friends with your therapist

1.25.18  3:09 pm   why did you say new canaan is in pennsylvania?

     try singing new canaan connecticut to start that song, and i think you will see the problem
